albums.title: 3) Vintage Fetes / Fayres
albums.desc: We all love Village Summer Fetes and Vintage Fayres.

albums.title: 4) The Jays Vintage Vocal Tribute Group
albums.desc: I am also proud to be part of a 1940s Vocal Vintage Tribute Group with some lovely ladies. We sing Andrews sisters, Bing Crosby, Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin style songs.

The Jays Vocal Vintage Tribute Group from Tamworth Staffordshire

albums.title: 5) A Vintage Christmas
albums.desc: Xmas with Andy B Goode and The Jays is always quite special. We have enjoyed performing some Xmas Lights Switch on events at Tamworth and Ashby-de-la-Zouche.

photos.cap: The Jays at Tamworth Christmas Light Switch on
The Jays at Ashby Christmas Light Switch on
Posing for the local Tamworth Herald Paper
Simply having a wonderful Xmas time
